scenario.name: Register UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:mobicents.org SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]1 From: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@mobicents.org>;tag=[call_number] To: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@mobicents.org> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:ua[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 120 Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:mobicents.org SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]2 From: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@mobicents.org>;tag=[call_number] To: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@mobicents.org> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 REGISTER Contact: sip:ua[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0
